short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into a cozy Christmas room with a live wallpaper that brings the warmth and joy of the holidays to your new tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This festive new tab extension transforms your browser into a charming, decorated Christmas room. Each time you open a new tab, you'll find yourself in a cozy room filled with twinkling lights, a beautifully adorned Christmas tree, and a crackling fireplace. Soft snowfall can be seen through the window, adding to the serene holiday ambiance.

Customize your experience with gentle animations like flickering candle lights, falling snowflakes, and calming holiday music. Whether you're relaxing by the fire or admiring the tree, this extension captures the essence of Christmas spirit and creates a comforting atmosphere while you browse. Perfect for anyone who loves the warmth and coziness of the holiday season, this live wallpaper makes every new tab feel like a visit to your favorite Christmas room. Let the holiday magic surround you all season long!
